long_description: Keep your hands warm while you're atop an alpine peak with The North Face Himalayan mittens . Ripstop nylon exteriors with Gore WindStopper(R) laminate eliminate windchill yet remain breathable so you stay dry and warm. High-quality 600-fill goose down combines with PrimaLoft(R) polyester fiber insulation for exceptional warmth in frigid temperatures. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive in liners dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry moves moisture from 1 layer to another to keep you dry. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Kevlar-reinforced knuckles and finger caps stand up to frequent use. Grippy water-resistant leather palms help you hold onto ski poles, ice axes and other gear. Soft polyester lining is comfortable next to skin. Tighten the gaskets at the cuffs to lock out winter weather; ladderlock wrist cinches secure the fit. Include hang loops so you can clip the mittens to your climbing harness with a carabiner (sold separately). Leashes secure The North Face Himalayan mittens to your wrists.
